definition: "speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
test point/to carry out trial/pilot scheme
to debug/to adjust components during testing/debugging
to try sth out/to be on probation

sentences.english: Now I am making an attempt to explain the positions of categories such as primitive accumulation and some others.
sentences.chinese: 这里，对原始积累等范畴的位置，试提出一种解释。

sentences.english: The fire proves gold, adversity brave men.
I'll give you some advice, Mike, don't try.
sentences.chinese: 迈克，我要给你些忠告，别去试。

sentences.english: B. Pick out the proper nouns in the following sentences.
sentences.chinese: 试选出以下句子中的专有名词。

sentences.english: He took a deep draw on his pipe and tried again.
sentences.chinese: 他猛吸了一口烟，又试了起来。

sentences.english: Let me take your measurements first. You can come and try it on in three days.
sentences.chinese: 我先给你量一下尺寸，三天以后来试样子。

sentences.english: When failures happen, have software quickly identify those failures and retry requests.
sentences.chinese: 发生故障时，让软件快速识别失败并重试请求。

sentences.english: Try running three days a week and cross-training two days a week for variety.
sentences.chinese: 试看看一个礼拜3天跑步，2天交叉训练搭配做变化。

sentences.english: Fire is the test of gold, adversity of strong man .
sentences.chinese: 烈火试真金，逆境炼壮士。

sentences.english: That done, he put the knife back in the drawer and shut it.
sentences.chinese: 试过以后，又把那刀子放进抽屉，重行推上。

sentences.english: East wind on the high grass sleep, try to ask his life fine days.
sentences.chinese: 东风吹草日高眠，试把平生细问天。

sentences.english: So don't try just one method to learn morse code.
sentences.chinese: 因此不只是试一个方法学习摩尔斯电码。

sentences.english: Which scientist was eager to make the hydrogen bomb?
sentences.chinese: 哪一位科学家亟亟欲试制造氢弹？

sentences.english: She then told me about a weight-loss clinic her sister had tried and had success with.
sentences.chinese: 然后她告诉我她姊姊之前试过一家减肥诊所超有效的。

sentences.english: The Cinderallas are busy trying the Glass Shoes.
sentences.chinese: 灰姑娘们忙着试玻璃鞋。

definition: to try sth out/to be on probation
to work for a trial period/worker on probation
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
metropolitan civil service examination (held triennially in spring in imperial times)
